task.title: 2.5.3 编辑或删除引注

shortdesc.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

task.shortdesc: 本节介绍如何在Word文档中编辑或删除已插入的引注。

taskbody.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

context.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

p.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

context.p: 对已插入的引注进行编辑或删除，可采取以下步骤：

steps.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

step.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

step.cmd: 将光标定位在需要编辑或删除的引注内。

step.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

info.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

p.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

info.p: 如果需要编辑引注内容，在引注对话框中进行修改，然后按Enter键保存更改。如下图所示：

image.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

step.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

cmd.xtrf: file:/Users/mac/Desktop/2024入学/课程/技术写作/期末作业/小组作业/zotero_tutorial%20final/Chapter2/part7/edit_and_delete_citations.dita

step.cmd: 如果需要删除引注，选中引注后按Delete键或右键选择删除。
